mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_RDM_REQ_ID.NEXTVAL,6,'0') AS REQ_ID FROM DUAL

SELECT REQ_ID, REQ_CHL, REQ_TYPE, REQ_STS, TEKIYO_YMD, REQ_BR_CODE, REQ_DIST_CODE, REQ_SHZ, REQ_JGI_NO, REQ_JGI_NAME, REQ_YMDHMS, REQ_MEMO, REQ_COMMENT, REQ_KNG_KBN, SHN_FLG, SHN_BR_CODE, SHN_DIST_CODE, SHN_SHZ, SHN_JGI_NO, SHN_SHA_ID, SHN_YMDHMS, APR_BR_CODE, APR_DIST_CODE, APR_SHZ, APR_JGI_NO, APR_SHA_ID, APR_YMDHMS, APR_HRY_FLG, APR_MEMO, APR_COMMENT, INS_NO, DOC_NO, UPD_MST_YMD, FB_REQ_FLG, FB_REQ_ID, FB_ANS_ID, FB_DATA_TYPE, FB_REC_ID, FB_UPD_KBN, FB_PRC_TYPE, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}

SELECT REQ_ID, REQ_CHL, REQ_TYPE, REQ_STS, TEKIYO_YMD, REQ_BR_CODE, REQ_DIST_CODE, REQ_SHZ, REQ_JGI_NO, REQ_JGI_NAME, REQ_YMDHMS, REQ_MEMO, REQ_COMMENT, REQ_KNG_KBN, SHN_FLG, SHN_BR_CODE, SHN_DIST_CODE, SHN_SHZ, SHN_JGI_NO, SHN_SHA_ID, SHN_YMDHMS, APR_BR_CODE, APR_DIST_CODE, APR_SHZ, APR_JGI_NO, APR_SHA_ID, APR_YMDHMS, APR_HRY_FLG, APR_MEMO, APR_COMMENT, INS_NO, DOC_NO, UPD_MST_YMD, FB_REQ_FLG, FB_REQ_ID, FB_ANS_ID, FB_DATA_TYPE, FB_REC_ID, FB_UPD_KBN, FB_PRC_TYPE, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT REQ_ID, REQ_CHL, REQ_TYPE, REQ_STS, TEKIYO_YMD, REQ_BR_CODE, REQ_DIST_CODE, REQ_SHZ, REQ_JGI_NO, REQ_JGI_NAME, REQ_YMDHMS, REQ_MEMO, REQ_COMMENT, REQ_KNG_KBN, SHN_FLG, SHN_BR_CODE, SHN_DIST_CODE, SHN_SHZ, SHN_JGI_NO, SHN_SHA_ID, SHN_YMDHMS, APR_BR_CODE, APR_DIST_CODE, APR_SHZ, APR_JGI_NO, APR_SHA_ID, APR_YMDHMS, APR_HRY_FLG, APR_MEMO, APR_COMMENT, INS_NO, DOC_NO, UPD_MST_YMD, FB_REQ_FLG, FB_REQ_ID, FB_ANS_ID, FB_DATA_TYPE, FB_REC_ID, FB_UPD_KBN, FB_PRC_TYPE, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR ORDER BY REQ_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RDM_REQ_KNR(REQ_ID, REQ_CHL, REQ_TYPE, REQ_STS, TEKIYO_YMD, REQ_BR_CODE, REQ_DIST_CODE, REQ_SHZ, REQ_JGI_NO, REQ_JGI_NAME, REQ_YMDHMS, REQ_MEMO, REQ_COMMENT, REQ_KNG_KBN, SHN_FLG, SHN_BR_CODE, SHN_DIST_CODE, SHN_SHZ, SHN_JGI_NO, SHN_SHA_ID, SHN_YMDHMS, APR_BR_CODE, APR_DIST_CODE, APR_SHZ, APR_JGI_NO, APR_SHA_ID, APR_YMDHMS, APR_HRY_FLG, APR_MEMO, APR_COMMENT, INS_NO, DOC_NO, UPD_MST_YMD, FB_REQ_FLG, FB_REQ_ID, FB_ANS_ID, FB_DATA_TYPE, FB_REC_ID, FB_UPD_KBN, FB_PRC_TYPE, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID) VALUES (#{reqId}, #{reqChl}, #{reqType}, #{reqStsCd}, #{tekiyoYmd}, #{reqBrCd}, #{reqDistCd}, #{reqShzNm}, #{reqJgiNo}, #{reqJgiName}, #{reqYmdhms}, #{reqMemo}, #{reqComment}, #{reqKngKbn}, #{shnFlg}, #{shnBrCode}, #{shnDistCode}, #{shnShz}, #{shnJgiNo}, #{shnShaName}, #{shnYmdhms}, #{aprBrCode}, #{aprDistCode}, #{aprShz}, #{aprJgiNo}, #{aprShaName}, #{aprYmdhms}, #{aprHryFlg}, #{aprMemo}, #{aprComment}, #{insNo}, #{docNo}, #{updMstYmd}, #{fbReqFlg}, #{fbReqId}, #{fbAnsId}, #{fbDataType}, #{fbRecId}, #{fbUpdKbn}, #{fbPrcType}, #{insShaYmd}, #{insShaId}, #{updShaYmd}, #{updShaId})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_REQ_KNR SET REQ_CHL = #{update.reqChl},REQ_CHL = NULL,REQ_TYPE = #{update.reqType},REQ_TYPE = NULL,REQ_STS = #{update.reqStsCd},REQ_STS = NULL,TEKIYO_YMD = #{update.tekiyoYmd},TEKIYO_YMD = NULL,REQ_BR_CODE = #{update.reqBrCd},REQ_BR_CODE = NULL,REQ_DIST_CODE = #{update.reqDistCd},REQ_DIST_CODE = NULL,REQ_SHZ = #{update.reqShzNm},REQ_SHZ = NULL,REQ_JGI_NO #{update.updShaYmd},UPD_SHA_YMD = NULL,UPD_SHA_ID = #{update.updShaId},UPD_SHA_ID = NULL, WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
mapper.select: SELECT UPD_SHA_YMD ,UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} FOR UPDATE NOWAIT
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_REQ_KNR SET SHN_BR_CODE = NULL,SHN_BR_CODE = #{shnBrCode}, SHN_DIST_CODE = NULL,SHN_DIST_CODE = #{shnDistCode}, SHN_SHZ = NULL,SHN_SHZ = #{shnShz}, SHN_JGI_NO = NULL,SHN_JGI_NO = #{shnJgiNo}, SHN_SHA_ID = NULL,SHN_SHA_ID = #{shnShaName}, SHN_YMDHMS = NULL,SHN_YMDHMS = #{shnYmdhms}, APR_MEMO = NULL,APR_MEMO = #{aprMemo}, SHN_FLG = NULLSHN_FLG = #{shnFlg} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}

UPDATE T_RDM_REQ_KNR SET REQ_CHL = NULL,REQ_CHL = #{reqChl}, REQ_KNG_KBN = NULL,REQ_KNG_KBN = #{reqKngKbn}, REQ_STS = NULL,REQ_STS = #{reqStsCd}, REQ_BR_CODE = NULL,REQ_BR_CODE = #{reqBrCd}, REQ_DIST_CODE = NULL,REQ_DIST_CODE = #{reqDistCd}, REQ_SHZ = NULL,REQ_SHZ = #{reqShzNm}, REQ_JGI_NO = NULL,REQ_JGI_NO = #{reqJgiNo}, REQ_JGI_NAME = NULL,REQ_JGI_NAME = #{reqJgiName}, REQ_YMDHMS = NULL,REQ_YMDHMS = #{reqYmdhms}, REQ_COMMENT = NULL,REQ_COMMENT = #{reqComment}, APR_BR_CODE = NULL,APR_BR_CODE = #{aprBrCode}, APR_DIST_CODE = NULL,APR_DIST_CODE = #{aprDistCode}, APR_SHZ = NULL,APR_SHZ = #{aprShz}, APR_JGI_NO = NULL,APR_JGI_NO = #{aprJgiNo}, APR_SHA_ID = NULL,APR_SHA_ID = #{aprShaName}, APR_YMDHMS = NULL,APR_YMDHMS = #{aprYmdhms}, FB_REQ_FLG = NULL,FB_REQ_FLG = #{fbReqFlg}, APR_MEMO = NULL,APR_MEMO = #{aprMemo}, APR_COMMENT = NULL,APR_COMMENT = #{aprComment}, UPD_SHA_YMD = NULL,UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = NULLUPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
mapper.select: SELECT UPD_SHA_YMD -- 申請管理.更新日 FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
SELECT REQ_YMDHMS , REQ_JGI_NAME , REQ_COMMENT FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR WHERE REQ_TYPE = '21' AND REQ_STS IN ('04', '14') AND INS_NO = #{insNo} ORDER BY REQ_YMDHMS DESC
SELECT MAX(UPD_SHA_YMD) AS UPD_SHA_YMD -- 申請管理.更新日 FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR WHERE INS_NO = #{insNo} AND REQ_TYPE = '21' AND REQ_YMDHMS IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_REQ_KNR SET REQ_STS = #{reqStsCd}, REQ_COMMENT = #{reqComment}, APR_MEMO = #{aprMemo},APR_MEMO = NULL, UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
UPDATE T_RDM_REQ_KNR SET REQ_STS = #{reqStsCd}, REQ_COMMENT = #{reqComment}, APR_MEMO = #{aprMemo},APR_MEMO = NULL, UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
